Get Hit By Zoa

farmCycles.name: Forget it
farmCycles.devNote: Leaving this logically unfarmable until further notice because it sucks

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bug Sand Hole Sand Jumps
note: Cross the Bug Sand Hole with nothing while avoiding the enemies.
Juke the Yapping Maw after entering and kill the Zoa to clear a path over the sand.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bug Sand Hole Damage Boost
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Wait inside the door frame of the Bug Sand Hole room while a Zoa rises out of the sand.  And using it to cross the room.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: With a fast enough jump into the Bug Sand Hole it is possible to cross over the water and land in the opposite door by morphing before reaching the ceiling.

strats.name: Base
Base
Bug Sand Hole Suitless HiJump (L to R)
strats.note: Kill the Zoa while avoiding the Yapping Maw, then cross the sand. Spring ball can be used to help cross the sand.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Suitless Frozen Bridge (L to R)
note: Freeze the Zoa as it spawns and use it to cross the sand.
Freeze any Yapping Maws that attack and use them as platforms to leave.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Suitless Kill Yapping Maws (L to R)
Naked Bug Sand Hole Sand Jumps (L to R)
note: Avoid the Yapping Maw after entering by not standing in one place for too long.
Kill the Zoa and quickly jump across the sand.
Escape by wall jumping when the water is low or using a crouch jump and down grab when it's high.
Hitting the Zoas will drop Samus deep into the sand below.

strats.name: Naked Bug Sand Hole Damage Boost (L to R)
note: Avoid the Yapping Maw after entering by not standing in one place for too long.
Jump back into the entry door by wall jumping when the water is low or using a crouch jump and down grab when it's high.
Once the Zoa has risen out of the water, use it to damage boost into the open opposite door.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Space Jump (L to R)
note: Enter the room able to Space Jump
Requires shooting the door in midair, otherwise water is involved.
devNote: Space Jump once in the water does not provide advantages towards clearing the room other than not touching the sand.
The enemies must still be avoided and a walljump or downgrab is needed to reach a door.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph (L to R)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: Build up run speed and jump into the transition to cross this room without touching the water.
Shoot open the opposite door upon entering and morph before touching the ceiling to bounce into the open door.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.note: Enter with a high shinespark through the door then shoot the opposite door and fall into it.
strats.devNote: Representing the need to enter in a high spark with canPrepareForNextRoom and framesRemaining.
